game.name: Wordle 4
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Wordle 4 is a new format puzzle game from the Wordle series. 29 new categories scattered across the English alphabet from A to Z.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Wordle 4 is a new format puzzle game from the Wordle series. 29 new categories scattered across the English alphabet from A to Z.

reviewHighlights.text: game too loud and no settings so cant change, lets you soft-lock yourself on levels
The fourth "Wordle" game I played and I'm still mad this isn't really Wordle.
